com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Class SCUIWebValidationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCValidationContext
      • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web.SCUIWebValidationContext

  • public class SCUIWebValidationContext
extends SCValidationContext
    This class provides validation related contextual information. This context provides current request and response objects in addition to superclass context. Any rule with SCJavaValidationRule as superclass can make use of this information. asmishra
